title: Add streaming support for council responses
description: Implement SSE streaming for /api/council endpoint. Stream individual model responses as they complete, then stream chairman synthesis. Makes the UI more responsive for long deliberations.

title: Add conversation export (markdown, JSON)
description: Export council conversations to markdown or JSON format. Useful for documentation, sharing, or archiving deliberation results.

title: Add /council slash command integration
description: Create a skill file for OpenCode that invokes the MCP tool with /council command. Should support: /council <query>, /council --fast <query> (final_only), /council --models opus,gemini <query>
